features: ADULT GUMMY WORM SUPPLEMENT: These wiggly little guys deliver a delightful dose of cheer to help you feel upbeat; The star of the show? Highly-prized Saffron, coveted for its powerful mood-balancing properties
Product Note: Exposure to heat or sunlight may lead to melting/damage of product; Hence customers are expected to be available during the product delivery

THE GOODS INSIDE: Saffron helps boost serotonin for those feel-good vibes; It’s paired with Vitamin D, a happy mood’s bestie that goes straight to the source to support cellular and brain health, and provide antioxidant benefits
HOW TO TAKE: Chew two gummy worms daily for best results, no food or water needed. 90 gummies per bottle (45-day supply)
NATURALLY DELICIOUS: These mood support OLLY gummies come in naturally flavored Tropical Zing (a lively blend of pineapple, peach and orange) with no artificial colors or flavors and gluten-free
MORE OLLY GOODNESS: We create products that are just as effective as they are delicious— gummies, daily multivitamins, premium softgels and more ways to feel happy inside out
body.description: Sunny side up. OLLY Hello Happy Gummy Worms for adults deliver a delightful dose of cheer to help you feel upbeat. The star of the show? Highly-prized Saffron, a superspice that’s coveted for its powerful mood-balancing properties.* All this goodness is packed in a delicious Tropical Zing flavor (a lively blend of pineapple, peach and orange) to make these adult gummy worm supplements even more irresistible. Zero artificial colors or flavors, and gluten-free, too. Good health is at the center of everything we do. That's why we’ve made it our mission to make nutrition easy to understand. We do it by crafting products that are as effective as they are delicious—because we know when something feels good, you’re more likely to do it. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sleep Gummies Stress Gummies Multi + Probiotic Gummies Daytime Immunity Gummies Ultra Strength Hair Softgels Key Benefits Fall asleep fast & stay asleep for a restful night* Fast working stress relief & relaxes mind to keep cool* Fill nutritional gaps and support immunity & digestion* Anytime you want to give your immune system an extra boost* Strengthens & softens hair, protects hair pigment, zero sugar* Key Ingredients 3mg Melatonin, L-Theanine & Botanicals GABA, L-Theanine & Lemon Balm 1 billion CFU Probiotics, Key Vitamins & Minerals Elderberry, Echinacea, Vitamin C & Zinc Biotin, Keratin, Vitamin D & B12 How To Take 1-2 gummies, 30 minutes before bed 2 gummies as needed 2 gummies per day 3 gummies as needed 1 softgel daily with water

Find Your Happy Place Look on the sunny side of things. At OLLY, we’re all about delivering a delightful dose of cheer. OLLY Hello Happy gummy worms help you feel upbeat with mood-balancing wonders, Saffron and Vitamin D.* Adults, chew two worms a day. Driven by Science These delicious gummy worms really deliver some feel-good benefits. Containing 30mg of Saffron Extract and 2,000 IU of Vitamin D, this expert blend supports balanced moods and provides antioxidant protection.* Who doesn’t want that? Little Gummies, Big Mood OLLY Hello Happy gummy worms are happily gluten free, GMO free, NSF certified and made with no synthetic flavors or colors. These gummy worms for adults come in a vibrant Tropical Zing flavor. OLLY vitamins and supplements offer real-deal benefits that are driven by science (and beloved by taste buds).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars delicious, and seem to work!
reviews.reviewText: I live in Oregon so am always looking for an excuse to remember to take Vit. D. These actually seem to make a difference in mood and are so very yummy that remembering to take them is easy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am impressed!
reviews.reviewText: Ok, I went into this totally skeptical that a "piece of candy" was going to effect my mood but I was desparate to try something. I was tired of being mad all the time, constantly, for no reason what-so-ever. About to explode over every little thing, all the time practically lol. Hated feeling like that.I was with my mom picking up a prescription at the pharmacy. While waiting for her I saw these in the pharmacy for the first time and was totally taken aback. The price wasn't bad, considering, so I figure sure.Fast forward to now. About a month later. Man how I wish I'd known these had been around. For me, it really didn't take but a day to start to realize that I hadn't gotten mad or even really irrated all day. That was a very odd feeling. Odd in a good way as it'd been so long since I knew what that felt like. So, I continued and have gotten through an entire week of work without feeling stressed, mad, angry or anxious. Really a first for me in a very, very long time.While I can't say this would work the same for everyone, as I don't know, but, for me, it's been amazing and I'm so glad I got it. My energy level has also been a bit off the charts as compared to how I was just a month ago. I was very lazy, moody, tired, bored, just uck feeling all the time. I'm noticiably not now and really can't sit still for too long. Like I was before. Not even close. For starters I'm writing a review. I don't generally take the time to write reviews.I now come here to buy as it's just easier than going to the store, but the price is basically the same.The taste is good. It's sour or tart but I like that. It's like eating a gummy worm. Easy to eat and a great taste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Prozac for me
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been feeling amazing, motivated and energized since I started taking this. It’s similar to Prozac but without the side effects. The flavor takes a little getting used to. It has a strong saffron taste.I’m also taking Lavela (lavender pills) for anxiety, so I think it is having a synergistic effect with the happy worms. I’m so glad to be feeling better without the side effects of medications.If you’re depressed and have anxiety, I highly recommend Hello Happy and Lavela. Also try to incorporate a little exercise routine every week. I set small achievable goals for myself so I don’t get overwhelmed. If you need additional emotional support get a pet. Ask your doctor to write you a note saying that you require an emotional support animal to help you and you won’t get evicted—in California.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good flavor but…
reviews.reviewText: Today is my first day taking them! Got these in the mail and unfortunately the ice pack was melted all over the container of the gummies so i had to wash them off. Went to try it and it smells like straight plastic in there but i didn’t care, i ate 2 gummies and the taste is so yummy but the aftertaste is straight plastic, still trying to get the taste out of my mouth lol. Other than that I’m sure these are great, just not gonna order from now on and I’ll just go get them myself at a store near me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
reviews.reviewText: I have been taking the Hello Happy gummies for several months now. I loved the flavor when the first time I tried the gummies, but I didn't notice at first if they were working or not. Slowly over time, I can feel that it actually boosted my mood and made me more bright and bubbly. The product is awesome for clearing clouds on days clouds hang around you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A bit sour but good
reviews.reviewText: I have just been reading about the benefits of saffron, so I thought I'd give these a try. Lots of Vitamin D, too, which is good. These taste like sour gummy worms. Not bad at all. The kids like them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I took these to improve my mood but instead of feeling happy I feel mellow and kinda tired. Maybe the effect varies from person to person because I don’t feel angry anymore, just tired. The smell is also really bad, opening the container is like a punch to the face. Other than that they taste good and could possibly work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow, just wow!
reviews.reviewText: I try a lot of health products and don't usually see a difference. For me, Olly's Happy vitamins did exactly what was expected. I've had a more positive mindset and accomplished more stuff in the last 5 days I have been taking them. I feel great, with a BIG difference. I gave these to my family too and saw mood improvements. These are awesome!
